model.name: postgresql_ds
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE wine_PG ( wine_id integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"wine_id"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), vineyard string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"vineyard"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), varietal string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"varietal"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), name string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"name"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), "year" integer NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"year"', NATIVE_TYPE 'INTEGER', FIXED_LENGTH 'TRUE'), country string(255) NOT NULL OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"name"', NATIVE_TYPE 'VARCHAR'), CONSTRAINT wine_pkey PRIMARY KEY(wine_id) ) OPTIONS(NAMEINSOURCE '"public"."wine"', UPDATABLE 'TRUE')

model.name: Services
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW wine ( wine_id integer NOT NULL, vineyard string(255) NOT NULL, varietal string(255) NOT NULL, name string(255) NOT NULL, "year" integer NOT NULL, country string(255), CONSTRAINT wine_pkey PRIMARY KEY(wine_id) ) AS SELECT 1, 'WINE', 'WINE', '2017', 99, 'SCOTLAND';
